entry.title: Array Shrinking
entry.content:
E - Array Shrinking

ç”¨dp[i][j].fiè¡¨ç¤ºè¿é€šå—çš„å¤§å°ï¼Œç”¨dp[i][j].seè¡¨ç¤ºè¿é€šå—è¡¨ç¤ºçš„æ•°ã€‚

ç„¶åå†è¿›è¡ŒåŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ï¼Œa[i]è¡¨ç¤ºä»1~iå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°çš„æœ€çŸ­é•¿åº¦ã€‚

// Created by CAD on 2020/3/9.
#include <bits/stdc++.h>

#define fi first
#define se second
#define pii pair<int,int>
using namespace std;

pii dp[505][505];
int a[505];
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int n;cin>>n;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i)
        cin>>dp[i][i].se,dp[i][i].fi=1;
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i)
        for(int j=i;j>=1;--j){
            for(int k=i-1;k>=j;--k){
                if(dp[k+1][i].se&&dp[j][k].se&&dp[k+1][i].se==dp[j][k].se)
                    dp[j][i].se=dp[k+1][i].se+1,dp[j][i].fi=dp[k+1][i].fi+dp[j][k].fi;
            }
        }
    for(int i=1;i<=n;++i){
        a[i]=a[i-1]+1;
        for(int j=i-1;j>=1;--j){
            if(dp[j][i].fi) a[i]=min(a[i-dp[j][i].fi]+1,a[i]);
        }
    }
    cout<<a[n]<<"\n";
    return 0;
}
